member.name: P:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.IsThreadSafe
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance uses exclusive locking when accessing the internal buffer for thread safety.

member.name: P:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.IsCrypto
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance is using the cryptographic provider. Always true in .NET. In Fable, depends on environment and the fableAllowNonCrypto option.

member.name: M:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.NextUInt8(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns a random 8-bit unsigned integer greater than or equal to the specified minimum and less than the specified maximum.

member.name: M:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.NextUInt8(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns a random 8-bit unsigned integer less than the specified maximum.

member.name: M:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.NextUInt8
member.summary: Returns a random 8-bit unsigned integer greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to Byte.MaxValue.

member.name: M:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.NextUInt64(System.UInt64,System.UInt64)

member.name: M:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.NextDouble
member.summary: Returns a random double greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than 1.0 (using 53 random bits).

member.name: M:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.NextBytes(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the specified bytes in the specified array to random bytes.

member.summary: Sets all bytes in the specified array to random bytes.

member.name: M:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.NextBoolean
member.summary: Returns a random boolean.

member.summary: Returns a random 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to the specified minimum and less than the specified maximum.

member.name: M:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a random 32-bit signed integer less than the specified maximum.

member.name: M:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.Next
member.summary: Returns a random 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to 0 and less than Int32.MaxValue.

member.name: M:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a BufferedCryptoRandom instance, optionally configured using the specified parameters.
member.param: Buffer size in bytes (min 16, max 65536). Default: 1024
Enable exclusive locking when accessing the internal buffer for thread safety. Default: true
In Fable app, if environment doesn't support crypto RNG, allow fallback to non-crypto RNG. Default: false (throws exception when no crypto support)

member.name: T:Zanaptak.BufferedCryptoRandom.BufferedCryptoRandom
member.summary: A buffered and thread-safe wrapper around the cryptographic random number generator for .NET and Fable.
